section.title: Dependencies
section.p: XeuMeuLeu itself only requires Apache Xerces, however in order to compile and run the unit tests the Boost Test library and Mockpp are needed.

section.title: Apache Xerces
section.p:
Refer to the Apache Xerces installation.
If a binary distribution does not exist for your platform you will have to build it.
XeuMeuLeu has been tested with Apache Xerces 2.7.0.

section.title: Boost Test
section.p: Refer to the Boost getting started instructions in order to compile the library.

section.title: Mockpp
section.p:
Refer to the Mockpp installation instructions in order to install it.
Note that you do not need CppUnit if you do not wish to run Mockpp unit tests.

section.title: Microsoft Visual Studio
section.p: In order to compile XeuMeuLeu with Microsoft Visual Studio follow the steps :

ol.li: if needed copy the xerces dll in a directory called run to be created in the project root directory
open the solution located in build/vc71
in Tools / Options / Projects / VC++ Directories add include and library directories pointing to the dependencies

section.p: Two directories will be created in the project root directory :

ul.li: lib will contain the XeuMeuLeu library files
include will contain the headers needed in order to use XeuMeuLeu

section.p:
The tests are run as a post-build step when building the solution.
If needed however launching xeumeuleu_test with ctrl-F5 requires some additional project properties to be set :

section.title: Gnu C++ Compiler
section.p: In order to compile XeuMeuLeu with Gnu C++ Compiler follow the steps :

ol.li: change the INC_DIRS and LIB_DIRS variables at the top in order to indicate the location of the dependencies
run make from the build directory

section.p: Two directories will be created in the project root directory :

ul.li: lib will contain the XeuMeuLeu library files
include will contain the headers needed in order to use XeuMeuLeu
